name: neeq2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))
-| wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wne(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c2)

comment: Inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Nov-2019.)
